vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in W_WALLET.collect (patch_17.sol#26-33):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_17.sol#29-32)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- acc (patch_17.sol#30)
